summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 25, 2019. It details routine operations, staff issues, and inmate statuses, most notably confirming that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was on suicide watch with an inmate companion. The report also notes inquiries from the US Marshals Service and the Daily News regarding a possible suicide attempt by Epstein.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Inmate #76318-054, listed as being on suicide watch with an inmate companion. The report notes external inquiries about a possible suicide attempt involving him.

connections.description: Epstein was on suicide watch with an inmate companion, indicating a custodial or monitoring arrangement within the correctional facility.
Inmate Burnett was at a local hospice under guard by US Marshals Service personnel.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was reported to be on suicide watch with an inmate companion at MCC New York.

events.title: External Inquiries About Epstein
events.description: Individuals from the US Marshals Service and the Daily News made inquiries to institution staff about inmate Epstein, specifically regarding a 'Possible suicide attempt'.

events.title: Multiple Inmates Placed in SHU
events.description: Inmates Kaba, Deleon, and two inmates named Guillen were placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for possession of cellular telephones.

events.title: Staffing Shortages Reported
events.description: The report notes multiple correctional officer assignments (Search Officer, SHU #2, SHU #4, Escort #3) were unassigned due to a shortage of staff. Staff also reported exhaustion from working daily overtime.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
Local Hospice (where inmate Burnett was held)
keyFacts: On July 25, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was confirmed to be on suicide watch at MCC New York with an inmate companion.
The report documents that the US Marshals Service and the Daily News had made inquiries to prison staff about a 'Possible suicide attempt' by Epstein.
The document reveals operational issues at MCC New York, including staff exhaustion from overtime and unassigned posts due to staffing shortages.
Several other inmates were disciplined and placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for possessing contraband cell phones on the same day.
The report is a routine administrative log, providing a snapshot of prison conditions just weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
